author: Neuro Assassin
install_msg: Thank you for downloading this cog.  Please note that when using this cog, you should not use the command `[p]cog update`, but instead use `[p]update all`, which runs that same command and then tracks down the latest commits from repositories.
name: updatechecker
short: Notifies you when an update for a repo is available.
description: This cog will tell when there is an update available for a repository you have added for your bot, and, depending on settings, will auto update or will just notify you.
